title: The Media is Spreading Hysteria (Ep 1194)
description:
In this episode, I address the irresponsible, outrageous media hysteria in the wake of the Coronavirus outbreak. I show examples of their grossly irresponsible behavior. I also address this major move by a wealthy Republican to shake up Twitter. Finally, I address another NY Times story which appears to be an effort to get ahead of another Spygate reveal. 
News Picks:

In a shocking turn, Pete Buttigieg drops out of the presidential race.

Why is The NY Times leaking the name of this key Spygate collaborator? What are they up to?


Left-Wing Politico gets smacked down in a brutal fact-check about the Coronavirus.

Debunking another dangerous lie from the Democrats about Trump’s handling of the Coronavirus.


A major Republican donor is making major moves to transform Twitter from the liberal hive it has become.


Covington students to sue five more media outlets after CNN settlement. 


Major news about the Supreme Court and Obamacare. 



Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
